summary: Adds recipes for unenchanted Cultist Gear in Light Armor and Heavy Armor variants. Clothing version coming soon!
descriptionHtml:
***Dragonborn Required***

**Update: Now includes Cloth variant, for mage-classes!

**Adds craftable, enchantable stand-alone variants of the Cultist gear from Dragonborn. Now you can craft Light, Heavy, and Cloth versions of the gear that Miraak Cultists wear! 

**Includes an unenchanted cloth version, so you can place your own enchantments on it.

**Padded Cultist Gear - Light Version
**Armored Cultist Gear - Heavy Version
**Cultist Gear - Cloth Version

**Both armor variants require the Arcane Blacksmith perk, and can be crafted at any forge.

**Cloth version does not require any smithing perks, and can be crafted at any Tanning Rack, under the Misc. section.

**Padded Cultist Gear can be found in the Leather Section.

**Armored Cultist Gear can be found in the Steel Section.

**Padded Cultist Gear has a base armor rating equivalent to Leather Armor, and uses Leather as a tempering agent.

**Armored Cultist Gear has a base armor rating equivalent to Steel Armor, and uses Steel as a tempering agent.

**Installation Procedure is the standard NMM/Manual procedure.

Comments/Suggestions/Bug Reports are indeed welcome and encouraged. Feel free to endorse if you like the mod as well.
author: Scyantific
